attributes.action: recommend to Her Majesty the Queen that the comedian Ken Dodd be given a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No comedian has given the British public more laughter than the great Liverpool comedian, Ken Dodd.
He amply deserves a knighthood for simply making people happy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recommend to Her Majesty the Queen that the comedian Ken Dodd be given a knighthood."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17359


Prime Minister's Office
